description.narrative:
2. 2 Professional development of community-based organization and Ministry of Health staff, law enforcement, media personnel and parents Training material on GBV protocol, code of conduct, referral pathway and updated Standard Operating Procedures of GBV as well as protocols and etiquette for engaging with and interacting with people with disability in addition to how to support, respond to and protect women victims of GBV.
The training will be conducted in the south region (Karak, Tafileh, Maan and Aqaba) to fill in the skills gap in this region. The training will target community-based organization, relevant service providers and decision makers form local authorities, and parents of people with disability. The training will take place in Aqaba governorate, and we will bring all the targeted beneficiaries (111 personnel) from Karak, Tafileh and Maan for intensive training sessions over a period of 3 days during last of October 2021.
Day 1: Training for Community based organizations /DPOs from 4 governorates - 1 training day / 6 hours • 15 from Aqaba, 7 from Tafileh including the National Woman’s Health Care Center (NWHC), 7 from Karak, 7 Maan Total # of attendees 36
Day 2: Training for governmental officials – service providers: 1 training day / 6 hours • Ministry of Social Development - Tafileh, Karak Maan Aqaba (4 representatives) • Ministry of Education - Tafileh, Karak Maan Aqaba Aqaba (4 representatives) • Ministry of Justice - Tafileh, Karak Maan Aqaba Aqaba (4 representatives) • Ministry of Health - Tafileh, Karak Maan Aqaba Aqaba (4 representatives) • Ministry of Interior - Tafileh, Karak Maan Aqaba Aqaba (4 representatives) • Ministry of Labor - Tafileh, Karak Maan Aqaba Aqaba (4 representatives) • Police Directorate (family of health)- Tafileh, Karak Maan Aqaba Aqaba (4 representatives) • Media Commission - Tafileh, Karak Maan Aqaba Aqaba (4 representatives) • Aqaba Special Economic Zone Authority (ASEZA)- Aqaba (2 representatives) • Municipalities Tafileh, Karak Maan Aqaba Aqaba (4 representatives) Total # of attendees 38
Day 3: Training for parents of People with disablity and the disabled: 1 day training day / 6 hours • 22 from Aqaba, 5 Tafileh, 5 Karak, 5 Maan Total # of attendees 37
